summary.purpose: Provides an Express middleware factory that trims all string values in the request body.
summary.problem_solved: Eliminates leading and trailing whitespace from all string fields in incoming request bodies, preventing data quality issues caused by user input with accidental whitespace.

internal.purpose: Utility function that recursively trims all string values in an object

exports.name: trim_body_middleware
exports.description: Middleware factory that returns an Express middleware to trim all string values in req.body

symbols.name: trim_body_middleware
symbols.description_one_line: Factory that returns Express middleware to recursively trim all string values in the request body object.

returns.description: An Express middleware function that trims req.body strings and calls next()

details.what_it_does: Returns an Express middleware that checks if req.body exists and is an object. If so, replaces req.body with the result of trim_strings(req.body), which recursively trims all string values in the body. Always calls next() to continue the middleware chain.
side_effects: Mutates req.body by replacing it with a trimmed copy of all string values
